name: Pickle's Card Flip
description:
Pickle's Card Flip is a classic card matching game with a twist: every time you win a match game, you get to play a mini-game and help Pickle play dress-up with her dolls.


Card Flip Game:
- Features hundreds of custom-illustrated cards
- Easy (6 cards), Medium (12 cards), & Hard levels (24 cards)
- Includes speed mode and free play mode
- Tracks your fastest time, highest level, and your accuracy

Dress-Up Bonus Mini Game:
- Features over 25 different dolls
- Includes hundreds of clothing items and accessories to customize Pickle's dolls.

A perfect combo of brain-building matching exercises and the fun of playing dress-up.


The Guys in the Booth are a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families.

Recommended Ages: 3-6
Categories: Matching, Creative Play
